message: Burt Reynolds as a bell-bottom-wearing moonshiner who just got out of prison.
Inspired by a recent Archer episode, I checked out Netflix Instant for some Burt Reynolds.
This is a public service announcement: GATOR IS ON NETFLIX INSTANT.
@mtrichardson I saw that episode of Archer.  And I recently heard the director of Gator interviewed on Adam Carolla's podcast.  It was interesting.  He was a stuntman and longtime roommate of Burt.
